problems.title: Swap For Longest Repeated Character Substring (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
You can swap two characters in the text. Return the length of the longest substring with repeated characters.

Input Format:
First line: string text.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum length.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
